"A.P.228/7/28": "You in the middle of helping someone out again? Man, busy as always!"
"Hmm, since you're always lending a hand, is that the reason you became so strong? Maybe I should follow your example!"
"Quite the troublemaker you are, running off to these training grounds unattended. The formal complaints have been making it all the way up to me."
"Lay off me! I learn better at my own pace! My grades show it!"
"Perhaps, but your fighting style will eventually fail to protect what is important to you. Is that what you want?"
"In any case, rules are rules. No exceptions, no matter how exceptional you may be."
"Let's go. Be prepared for a stern lecture."
"I apologize for the scene. Leave this boy to me and return to your mission."
